title: What happens when something that came into contact with the butt hole comes in contact with the vaginal opening? My wife and I started experimenting with anal stuff & now she has a 'bump' on the left side of her vagina. - Quora

response.answer_text: The two holes should never meet. In case no one told you, there is fecal matter in the butt hole as you call it. Fecal matter can carry bacteria which can cause problems when in contact with other body parts especially sensitive area like a vagina. Wear a condom and clean up. Avoid going between the anus and vagina. Have a doctor check the lump.
